Articles.Content: When i right-click on a planet in carreer mode the name stays and when i left-click nothing happens in carreer mode, its very annoing
You need to upgrade a building/facility to enable them, I can't remember which one(s) though.

I'm pretty sure it's the tracking station that needs the upgrade, right click it, and it will list the current capabilities, mouse over the upgrade button and it will list the added features of the upgrade.
